properties.Name: Sarvesh Telang
properties.Title: Software Developer | Data Scientist
properties.Summary: Engineer with 3+ years of experience in the automotive industry, delivering software solutions across multidisciplinary domains including automotive systems, AI, and data-driven technologies, with specialization in data science, machine learning, and model-based design.

Work Experience.Title: Working Student- Data Quality Engineer
Description: Led the label quality assurance team within the Automated Driving Alliance (Volkswagen Cariad & Bosch) for Level 3 autonomous driving systems
Conducted rigorous quality control and feature engineering, identifying and resolving 100+ critical labeling errors per week
Improved label accuracy by 40% through regular feedback to suppliers and weekly quality reports
Developed and deployed a Python tool for automated data quality assessment, integrated into the CI/CD pipeline
Designed a web-application with dashboard (using Azure and SharePoint API) to perform quality checks in real-time

Work Experience.Title: Data Science Intern
Description: Internship Topic: Enhancement of ADAS Hardware Development Process through Machine Learning, Cloud Deployment and Vehicle Sensor Data Analysis
Migrated the python version of multi-objective optimization algorithm, increasing computation accuracy by 6%
Identified and resolved 50+ critical bugs by debugging code using Dask over HPC clusters
Deployed the code over Azure cloud using Azure ML and Docker
Analyzed vehicle measurements from SHT and Type K sensors at 20+ ADAS sensor mounting locations
Built a python tool to investigate the impact of temperature and humidity on driving behavior
Designed a MATLAB visualization tool to profile drivers across varying conditions

Work Experience.Title: Process Executive
Description: Performed image and video frame annotations across 5+ autonomous vehicle projects utilizing NVIDIA HL2
Improved object detection accuracy and efficiency by 15%
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to ensure compliance with data labeling standards

Work Experience.Title: Technical Sales Engineer
Description: Engineered 5+ custom polyurethane products including vehicle engine mounts and PU panels
Conducted feasibility checks using CAD/CAE tools (AutoCAD, Ansys, SolidWorks)
Managed B2B sales operations in South India, securing 20+ new accounts
Increased qualified leads by 16% through targeted marketing strategies
Directed the Order to Cash process for procurement and inventory control

Education.Degree: Master of Science in Commercial Vehicle Technology
Details: Thesis: DNN-based Virtual Trajectory Generation for Autonomous Vehicles
Developed trajectory prediction framework using spatio-temporal road inference
Trained Seq-2-Seq Transformer Model for lane keeping
CGPA: 8.81/10 (Very good – equivalent to 1.5 in German Grading System)
Thesis: Design and Analysis of a Cost-Effective Cylindrical Robotic Arm

Achievements: Secured 2nd place out of 18 student groups in E-Mobility seminar competition

Projects.Name: Sampling-based Motion Planning of 7-DOF Robotic Arm
Description: Implemented CBi-RRT algorithm for path planning using MATLAB
Computed shortest path while avoiding obstacles using Task Space Regions

Projects.Name: Motion Prediction in Autonomous Vehicles
Description: Trained Keras-based FCN model using vehicle trajectory data
Optimized hyper-parameters using Optuna and Bayesian methods
Grade: 1,0 (Excellent)

Projects.Name: COVID 19 Dynamic Dashboard Development
Description: Built dashboard following CRISP-DM methodology
Integrated real-time data via RESTful APIs with DASH/Plotly
Grade: 1.0 (Excellent)

Projects.Name: Arduino-based Automation of a 4-DOF Cylindrical Robot Arm
Description: Architected prototype of 4-DOF robotic arm
Programmed Pick-and-Place operations using Embedded C++
Achieved 5th rank among 208 students
